hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select p.id,p.name,'(Project)' as typerelation from projects p where p.name like :words
union
select o.id,o.name,'(Opportunity)' as typerelation from opportunities o where o.name like :words

select count(*) from (select p.id,p.name,'(Project)' as typerelation from projects p where p.name like :words
union
select o.id,o.name,'(Opportunity)' as typerelation from opportunities o where o.name like :words) wmTempTable
select * from users where id in (select userresponsableid from opportunities where opportunitystateid=5 and (forecastclosedate between :date1 and :date2)) order by lastname asc,firstname asc

select count(*) from (select * from users where id in (select userresponsableid from opportunities where opportunitystateid=5 and (forecastclosedate between :date1 and :date2)) order by lastname asc,firstname asc) wmTempTable
